step.name: Deploy-certs
step.title: Deploy digital certificates for Function X
step.description: Create and deploy the digital certificates that are used to protect the data that Function X sends across the network.
step.instructions: In the Instructions area, describe in detail what the user needs to do to complete the step. Include any specific values the user needs to know, based on your requirements for the work to be completed. If you are directing the user to enter a command such as RACF RACDCERT, for example, use this element to state which values should be included on the command invocation. Other information here might include, for example, directions for using PKI services or entering the System SSL gskkyman command.
